title: Define V1 output contract + pipeline scaffolding
summary: Codify the match output bundle and canonical track/event schemas.
Create a minimal pipeline CLI and directory layout to make subsequent vision/calibration work incremental.

work_packages.title: Output bundle + schemas
items: TASK-V1-OUT-001 Define match bundle layout and required artifacts (overlay, BEV, tracks, events, report).
TASK-V1-DATA-001 Define canonical track record and metadata needed for fusion and reporting.

work_packages.title: Pipeline scaffolding
items: TASK-V1-CLI-001 Create a minimal CLI that initializes/validates bundle structure and manifests.
